title: avarice blade ........
body:
why was it removed from the game ? 
was it unhealthy ? 
i miss its presence always helps you catch up when behind

replies.body: i don't believe so. cull basically stops once you reach a threshold . stat wise yes but you never buy avarice for the stats
You can sell it and buy another one, if you've not catch up yet. But it gives more gold than old Avarice Blade gave.

Please I shed more tears than I should over this one item's  removal as an adc main.

I miss it too.. cull is worthless

They increased the gold minions provide on death overall. Carries power farming is not necessary, and should be easy to punish (if Vayne can auto win by playing safe and buying Avarice, then lane bullies aren't good)
Avarice + cull + old Ashe E = omg pls
If they do bring it back I hope it has a different theme to it.  Something to the effect of dumping gold into the item for power(maybe in small timed windows) for an AD boost could be cool.
Why would you ever buy cull on anyone. Maybe on passive people who never trade or people like kog
right cull is garbage. they can atleast bring back avarice blade for a upgrade to it because i can hold it for the whole game lol and buy hydra and get all my items in 25 mins.
